price: 47. Dijeron: “¿Vamos a creer en dos seres humanos como nosotros, cuando su pueblo es esclavo nuestro?”.
arabic: فَقَالُوٓاْ أَنُؤۡمِنُ لِبَشَرَيۡنِ مِثۡلِنَا وَقَوۡمُهُمَا لَنَا عَٰبِدُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: faqālū anu'minu libasharayni mith'linā waqawmuhumā lanā ʿābidūna
